thread.section_title: Dracakis Jewellers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dracakis Jewellers | dracakis.com.au
thread.title: Todd Moore and Trudi Ross
thread.title_full: Dracakis Jewellers reviewed by Todd Moore and Trudi Ross

author: Todd Moore and Trudi Ross
title: Todd Moore and Trudi Ross
text: My wife's engagement ring had an issue with diamonds coming loose. The ring was repaired first time around, and when the problem persisted they replaced the whole ring at no charge. Great service guys you couldn't have done more.
